reviewText: Great Movie. A movie that revived the Dragonballz series and did a great job doing so. Cant wait for more to come.
Movie was amazing must watch for intense action! This will make you think about dbz a lot. Watch the epic battles then the final showdown of Beerus vs a Saiyan god but who is it? Watch to find out.
I just love this movies period!
i like it love thanks you :)
Awesome movie in fact the most action packed and most amazing dragon ball z movie ever in my opinion
I'm assuming this is the English one..?? because you can watch the Japanese one on YouTube... I just want to know before I buy it. Anybody?

Not going to lie, I did buy and watch the Japanese version and growing up with the FUNimation cast made me miss that side so much.
When it was released in the US In theatres it was so refreshing to watch, the humor I actually got and it was like seeing it for the first time again!
This is a must have for DBZ fans old and new!

Really excited for the extended editon!
Great gift
Great addition to any DBZ fan!

The best DBZ movie made in a long-time. Brings Toriyama's famous humorous writing into the first Z movie in 17 years.
Berrus is a well developed Villain who isn't exactly the "bad guy" he has his own personality and flaws and also go well with Goku's personality and flaws. All your favorite characters are back even Pilaf which hasn't been seen since the first series.

Also Funimations amazing voice work is back. Good audio, Good acting, and Goku doesn't sound like an old Cantonese woman.

Ive been a fan of all the Dragon Ball Series and Movies. I ordered the two movies Battle of Gods and Ressurection Frieza. Ive just finished Battle of Gods and am thoroughly impressed. Top notch story. Top notch animation. Top notch DBZ film if you're a fan like me I PROMISE THIS MOVIE WILL MAKE YOU SAY...THIS IS WHAT I ALWAYS EXPECTED FROM DBZ. I think the creator listened to the fans and FINALLY delivered. No more useless storyline filling and cheap fight scene graphic tricks...REAL ANIME QUALITY. I cant wait to watch Ressurection Frieza now.

Brace yourselves but I'm not a Dragon Ball Z fan *gasp* (I know) but I LOVE this movie!! My boyfriend got me to watch it and I had to have the DVD. I love the story line, the humor, animation,  Lord Beerus and Weis! If it's a must have for a non fan, it's a must MUST have for any DBZ fan!

This movie truly sucks!  After the great battles scene during the DBZ tv series, the battle scenes in here are poor at best.  The focused more of the story on poor comedy relief than actual battling which the comedy centered around a lot of eating food.  Seriously!?!?  DO NOT BUY THIS MOVIE UNLESS YOU HAVE AN ABUNDANCE OF MONEY AND TIME TO WASTE.  You will be thoroughly disappointed.  As I am.  I'm so pissed off at the poor quality of the screenplay that it's not even close to being funny. The movie Supergirl was my all time worst film ever made until I viewed this movie.  This is my new all time worst movie.

i really enjoyed the movie the voice acting was good the storyline was ok all  and all if your a dragon ball z fans then you will like it . i can not say more with out giveing spoilers but a dragon ball z fan will like it. but to just don't compare it to the tv show cause it is not like the tv show but all and all i give it a 4 out of five like to seen more goku fighting

dragon ball z battle of the gods is an animation movie that deals with the god beerus wanting to challenge goku in a duel that would help decide whether earth is spared. This happens to be serious because beerus is the god of destruction. Beerus even goes as far to crash a party in order to meet an opponent who he feels would give him a healthy challenge. The celebration happens to be for a 38th birthday party and most of the partygoers are at first unaware of who beerus is.
Good quality

Great movie. Obviously after 17+ years, not everything's the same, but there are some classic elements that I've come to love and expect. Great movie! I just wish Vegeta wasn't a huge softie!

Product arrived quickly and neatly. 10/10 would do business with again.

I purchased this as a gift for my son who is an avid Dragonball fan and is passionate about anime in general. Great choice for those who missed it in theaters this past summer! He loves it and Amazon had the best price over the local stores with fast, reliable shipping. Happy 2015!

Dragon Ball Z is life and this movies fits in well with the rest of the DBZ gold.

It's been years since I've seen a DBZ movie & I have to say that the fight sequences are awesome, much better than any of the previous movies. Goku has to attain a level called Super Saiyan God in order to fight a God of Destruction named Beerus & these battles are what great Anime should be now days. Even after all these years of not watching DBZ, I still found this movie to be interesting.
